skills.name: GRIM GOSPEL
desc: • Deals 6 hits of random damage to a single target.
• Deal Additional Random Damage to all enemies for each beneficial effect on self.

skills.name: WRATH OF NERO
desc: • Steal Perfect Immunity from all enemies.
• Steal 2 Beneficial Effects from each enemy.
• Inflict Perfect Crave on all enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: DARK APOSTLE
desc: Inflict Perfect Silence on all enemies for 3 turns at the start of battle. Reduce the damage all allies take by 35%. Grant a random beneficial effect to each ally at the start of battle for 2 turns.
